definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

sentences.english: Gear Box uses the two-stage transmission made up of spiral cone-shaped gear and columned bevel wheel;
sentences.chinese: 减速器采用螺旋锥齿轮，圆柱斜齿轮二级传动。

sentences.english: Going into the gearbox, universal joints connect the centre drive shaft to the internal bevel gears.
sentences.chinese: 进入变速箱，万向节连接中心传动轴到内部锥齿轮。

sentences.english: Priciples of cutting epicycloid bevel gear by continuous indexing method are investigated systematically.
sentences.chinese: 对摆线齿锥齿轮连续分类法铣齿原理进行了系统研究。

sentences.english: These provide a foundation for the control of grinding quality of spiral bevel gear.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果为螺旋锥齿轮磨齿质量的控制提供了依据。

sentences.english: But in actual applications, spiral bevel gears on rigs are often damaged.
sentences.chinese: 但在实际应用中，钻机中弧齿圆锥齿轮常损坏。

sentences.english: The parametric modeling method for loxodrome normal circular-arc spiral bevel gear was presented.
sentences.chinese: 给出了斜航式法向圆弧螺旋锥齿轮的参数化建模方法。

sentences.english: Bevel gear actuators are recommended when pressure exceeds limits shown.
sentences.chinese: 果压差超过所列的极限值，则建议采用锥齿轮执行器。

sentences.english: Camber line wonts do orthogonal arc tooth wimble gear.
sentences.chinese: 中心线不成直角的弧齿锥齿轮。

sentences.english: Optimization method was used in the design of the spiral bevel gear of the main reducer.
sentences.chinese: 采用优化的方法设计了主减速器螺旋锥齿轮。

sentences.english: According to the simulation results, the process of bevel gear was determined.
sentences.chinese: 确定了精锻锥齿轮的成形工艺。

sentences.english: Rotate gear for several rounds, and the imprints left on the small bevel gear surface are touch imprints.
sentences.chinese: 此时粘印到小锥齿轮面上的印痕即为接触印痕。

sentences.english: Camber line becomes orthogonal arc tooth wimble gear.
sentences.chinese: 中心线成直角的弧齿锥齿轮。

sentences.english: It used bevel gears to transmit power to the prop.
sentences.chinese: 它使用的锥齿轮转交权力交给道具。

sentences.english: The bevel gear's cold forging die was designed based on the principles of cold precision forming.
sentences.chinese: 基于冷锻成形原理，对锥齿轮冷精锻模进行了设计。

definition: (of opposing teeth, or gears) to mesh/to engage
